domain.name: EmailNotifications
domain.description: email Notifications on Security Alerts Is Analytics.

scenario.description: Configure email Notification on security Alerts

templates.template:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <eventPublisher name="org.wso2.is.analytics.allISAlertsStream.publisher" processing="enable" statistics="disable" trace="disable" xmlns="http://wso2.org/carbon/eventpublisher"> <from streamName="org.wso2.is.analytics.allISAlertsStream" version="1.0.0"/> <mapping customMapping="enable" type="text"> <inline> Hi,
We detected a {{msg}}.
Type : {{type}} Tenant Domain : {{tenantDomain}} Severity : {{severity}} Time : {{userReadableTime}}
Please have a look !!!.
Best Regards, WSO2 Identity Server Team http://www.wso2.com </inline> </mapping> <to eventAdapterType="email"> <property name="email.subject">WSO2 IS security Alerts</property> <property name="email.address">$emailAddress</property> <property name="email.type">text/plain</property> <property name="email.body">text/plain</property> </to> </eventPublisher>

parameter.name: emailAddress
parameter.description: email address to send the security alert Notifications.
